advancement.os_advancements.gourmet_dora: Eat every golden food in the game.
The Sky Is Not The Limit
advancement.os_advancements.apropiacion_: Kill a zombie with rotten flesh, a skeleton with a bone, or a Blaze with a Blaze rod.
advancement.os_advancements.wardenkill.d: Kill the Warden, defender of the ancient undercity.
advancement.os_advancements.bdsm.title: Why?

What a beautiful garden you'll have!
advancement.os_advancements.endraid.desc: Enter the End with the bad omen effect active.

advancement.os_advancements.icaro.descri: Fly higher than 420 blocks in the Overworld with elytra.
